text: my name is mohan gowda i'm a senior data
centers with aws professional services
as a data scientist i work with multiple
customers across the globe across
industries to solve business problems
using aml which will not only help them
solve the business problem but also have
a positive impact on people like us
before joining aws i was working as a
data science consultant with the global
management consulting firm though i had
a rewarding career i always wanted to
work in a place that has a profound
impact on the world i got to know about
aws from one of my friends i applied in
amazon jobs portal i went to the
interview process and i moved from india
to europe to join aws professional
services team the most exciting part of
my role is basically to bring data
machine learning and business knowledge
into one piece and solve problems which
will have impact on
millions of people like us
if a new joiner want to join aws one of
the key things one need to know is
basically to be honest and bring their
own personality into the table because
we appreciate diversity at
aws
back in 2013 when amazon.10 was launched
in india my mother was very excited
about ordering item sitting at home
one afternoon my mom went like i was
having a lunch next to amazon office in
bangalore india a lot of excitement my
mom mentioned mohan look at the formula
which is having a profound impact on the
world why can't you like you know try
joining amazon now i work at amazon web
services and there's nothing more
fulfilling than making my mom happy
